sect1.title: DEFINE DEFINE

row.entry: The name of a RULE parsing pattern.
A string constant specifying the name to use in the USE option on a PARSE function or the USE function in a RULE parsing pattern.

sect1.para: The DEFINE function defines a symbol for the specified pattern that may be forward referenced in previously defined parsing pattern attributes. This is the only type of forward reference forward reference allowed in ECL.
See Also: PARSE, PARSE Pattern Value Types
